sentences.sentence: It has an inhibiting effect on inflammations and calms the skin.
sentences.translation: 楱子萃取液对炎症有抵制和增加肌肤弹性的作用。

sentences.sentence: It is used to treat various skin disorders such as acne, wrinkles, psoriasis, and other inflammations.
sentences.translation: 它被用于治疗各种肌肤失调问题，比如粉刺，皱纹，牛皮鲜以及其他炎症。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To study the anti-inflammations of the ethyl acetate extract of s. China on acute and chronic inflammations.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究菝葜醋酸乙酯提取物对大鼠和小鼠急性、慢性炎症的抗炎作用。
